bike.description: Aero 7005 double-butted aluminum track frame with aero down tube triangulated at BB shell for additional stiffness, airfoil radius bent seat tube with wheel cut-out, airfoil seatstays, rear entry track dropouts with stainless inserts

components.description: Carbon Aero Track fork with alloy steerer & crown, forged alloy dropouts
Alex RA30 aero rim, 32/32H, 30mm aero rim profile, Formula alloy track hubs with flip/flop rear and 14g stainless steel spokes
FSA F. Gimondi Track, single 46T x 165mm (48/51), 170mm (54/56), 175mm (58/61)
Jamis Track, 6061 aluminum, 31.8 x 420mm x 173mm drop x 109mm reach
Jamis Aero carbon post with integrated seat post clamp
Selle San Marco Ponza Arrowhead with Syntex cover and carbon steel rails
